text.text: MumaraCampaigns is an email marketing automation system that empowers businesses to easily send a series of emails to their clientele or a segmented chunk. We’ve built a powerful infrastructure that scales gracefully and handles multi-transactional processes so you don’t have to deal with the complexity and hassle of optimizing much.
You can upgrade or downgrade your license at any time by navigating to the associated product/service under your billing panel and finding the upgrade options there.

Upon signup, you’ll be taken to the invoice where you can select from the available payment methods, and upon successful payment, you’ll get the product activated for instant download. If you have subscribed to auto-billing, you’ll be automatically charged at the end of every billing cycle.
What is the difference between self-hosted and cloud editions?

The self-hosted version downloads the product to your computer that you’ll need to deploy at your own, on a live server, or a VPS. It involves technical knowledge of setting up the PHP environment, however, it comes up with an easy GUI wizard that will help you install the product. The cloud version comes up with a server and will auto-provision Mumara dependencies to give you an installed copy of the product. You’ll receive the Mumara login details in an email within a few minutes of placing a successful order. If you are not willing to take the hassles to go through server setup and installation processes, this is the right choice for you.
Do I need an SMTP to send emails?
Yes, you’ll need to have at least one SMTP account or an integrated ESP account to send your emails.

What server specs do I need?
Although Mumara Campaigns does also run on shared hosting plans, we highly recommend a dedicated machine with at least 4GB or higher RAM. The more sugar you add, the sweeter it becomes.
